response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed expectations. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your specific needs and elevate your experience. Considering its unique features and benefits, I believe it would be a valuable addition to your life or business. I am offering this exceptional product to you at a special introductory price of $7,500. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider this opportunity carefully. If you have any questions or need more information, please don't hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of bringing this product into your world.", "product_price": 7500}
